data.title: Jenny McCarthy and Jim Carrey Call it Quits!
data.meta_description: Wow, I did NOT see this one coming. The hilarious pair has parted ways after five years of dating, according to UsMagazine.com. But it doesn't look like this is going to be an acrimonious Hollywood breakup…
data.text:
Wow, I did NOT see this one coming. The hilarious pair has parted ways after five years of dating, according to UsMagazine.com. But it doesn't look like this is going to be an acrimonious Hollywood breakup…

"I'm so grateful for the years Jim and I shared together," McCarthy, 37, reportedly told the magazine via a statement. "I will continue to be in his daughter's life and will always keep Jim as a leading man in my heart."

Jim echoed this mature sentiment by Tweeting, "Jenny and I have just ended our 5yr relationship. I'm grateful 4 the many blessings we've shared and I wish her the very best! S'okay! ?;^>."

I am so sad to see this couple bite the dust. I really thought their relationship was going to stand the test of time.

Are you surprised that Jenny and Jim split? Do you think they might get back together? Have you ever called it quits with someone after several years of dating?

For more on this former couple…
